casebody.data:
OLD REPUBLIC NATIONAL TITLE INSURANCE COMPANY and United Bank & Trust Company, Versailles, Ky., f/k/a Farmers Bank & Trust Company (Georgetown, Ky.), Plaintiffs,
v.
HARTFORD FIRE INSURANCE COMPANY; Shrijee LLC; Helm Builders, LLC and Michael D. Andrews, in his official capacity as Sheriff of Durham County, North Carolina, Defendants. No. COA15-444. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. April 5, 2016.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

Affirmed in part; Reversed and Remanded in part.
